trans-unit.source: Provides a set of properties, such as flow direction, alignment, or indentation, that can be applied to a paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 提供可以套用至段落的屬性集，例如流向、對齊或縮排。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 這是 abstract 類別。

trans-unit.source: To create a text layout application that uses the services of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> object, you must create a derived class that implements the methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立文字版面配置應用程式使用之服務的<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>物件，您必須建立衍生的類別中實作之方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties>抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a formatted line can always be collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示格式化的行是否可以永遠摺疊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the formatted line can always be collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />, which indicates that only formatted lines that overflow the paragraph width are collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式化的行可以永遠摺疊則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />，後者表示只會摺疊超出段落寬度的格式化行。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default incremental tab distance.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設的索引標籤累加距離。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the default incremental tab distance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，表示預設的索引標籤累加距離。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default text run properties, such as typeface or foreground brush.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設的文字執行屬性，例如字樣或前景筆刷。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the text run is the first line of the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示文字執行是否為段落的第一行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the text run is the first line of the paragraph; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字執行為段落的第一行則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the primary text advance direction shall be left-to-right, or right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指定主要文字方向會是從左至右、從右至左。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" /> 的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of line indentation.
trans-unit.target: 取得行縮排的量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the amount of line indentation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示行縮排的量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a line of text.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字行的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the height of a line of text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示文字行的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of the paragraph indentation.
trans-unit.target: 取得段落縮排的量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the amount of the paragraph indentation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示段落縮排的量。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of tab definitions.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引標籤定義的集合。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabProperties" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabProperties" /> 物件的清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that describes how an inline content of a block is aligned.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值描述區塊內嵌內容的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextAlignment" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextAlignment" /> 的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecoration" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecoration" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies marker characteristics of the first line in the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示段落中第一行的標記特性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextMarkerProperties" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextMarkerProperties" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that controls whether text wraps when it reaches the flow edge of its containing block box.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值控制當文字到達其所包含之區段方塊流動邊緣時文字是否換行。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextWrapping" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextWrapping" /> 的列舉值。
